seed_pair.target: Y quiero que hables español conmigo mañana.
seed_pair.known: And I want you to speak Spanish with me tomorrow.

legos.note: Conjunction for connecting clauses - STRICT PATTERN VARIETY ENFORCED
practice_phrases: I want to speak and learn
I'm trying to speak and remember
I'm going to practise and learn
I'd like to speak and learn
I'm not sure if you speak Spanish and English
No estoy seguro si hablas español y inglés
I want you to speak and learn

legos.note: Desire + subjunctive construction - STRICT PATTERN VARIETY ENFORCED
practice_phrases: I'm trying to ensure you speak
I'm going to ensure you speak
I want you to speak now
I'm not sure if I want you to speak
No estoy seguro si quiero que hables
how I want you to speak
I can ensure you speak well
I want you to speak Spanish
I want you to speak tomorrow

legos.note: Prepositional phrase - single word in Spanish - STRICT PATTERN VARIETY ENFORCED
practice_phrases: I want to speak with me
I'm trying to practise with me
Are you going to speak with me?
I'd like to learn with me
I'm not sure if you want to speak with me
No estoy seguro si quieres hablar conmigo
I want you to speak with me
